column4: is it possible to set up samba on my network so that the other windows computers don't need a usr name and password to access shares?
do you know where i could find that info likein the wiki or smthing?
a read of 'using samba'  book avial online. will give ya all kinds of info
also you could just use 'ssh' and 'winscp' on the windows box's - it seems to be a little easier to setup. :P well trivial even..
